description: Table of blood and marrow transplant infusion information.

columns.name: SUMMARY_BLOCK_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the episode record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: HSCT_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Type of blood and marrow transplant.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Autologous


Unrelated allogeneic


Related allogeneic


Syngeneic: identical twin


Related allogeneic: matched sibling


Related allogeneic: partial matched

columns.name: BMT_SOURCE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Blood and marrow transplant source material.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Marrow


Peripheral blood stem cells


Umbilical cord blood


Multiple umbilical cord blood


Amniotic fluid


Natural killer (NK cells)


Donor lymphocyte infusions


Mesenchymal stem cells


Other cells

columns.name: BMT_INFUSION_DT
columns.description: Blood and marrow transplant infusion dates.

columns.name: BMT_IS_TANDEM_YN
columns.description:
Stores if the infusion is part of a blood and marrow tandem transplant.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Yes


No
